descriptionHtml:
Greetings!

I'm sharing my most recent character's RaceMenu preset for anyone interested in using it as a base for their own characters. Please keep in mind that this is just a preset file and no other mod resources are included so your results may vary.

[u]Mods used:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu 3.0[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE Body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Textures
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61157/?]Vanilla Warpaints as Facepaint[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534/?]Kountervibe ENB[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61157/?]
[/url]
For the hair you will have to use your own preferred hair mod.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/VFBdlY0l.jpg[/img]

[size=4][b]How To Install:[/b][/size]
Extract the contents of the ZIP file and copy to your Skyrim folder.

[size=4][b]How To Use:[/b][/size]
At character creation (or with showracemenu console command) go to the presets tab of RaceMenu and load this preset.

[size=4][b]How To Uninstall:[/b][/size]
Navigate to Skyrim/data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets/Akage.jslot and delete that file.

[size=4][b]Credits to:[/b][/size]
expired6978 for RaceMenu
Caliente for CBBE
HHaleyy for Fair Skin
Kyokushinoyama for Kountervibe ENB
EggOver1979 for Vanilla Warpaints as Facepaint
author: DM Veil
